description: Muththusamy Balaganeshan Vs. Hon.Attorney General - Hon. K.T. Chitrasiri, J before  Court of appeal has no jurisdiction to entertain appeals from a decision in which the Provincial High Court Judge has exercised appellate powers.
parties: Muththusamy Balaganeshan Vs. Hon.Attorney General - Hon. K.T. Chitrasiri, J
judgement_by: Court of appeal has no jurisdiction to entertain appeals from a decision in which the Provincial High Court Judge has exercised appellate powers.
